languages.text: Для совершения атак и применения способностей в бою используются очки действий (ОД). Их число отображается на панели в нижней части экрана. Каждая атака или способность требует определенных затрат ОД. В начале каждого хода ОД персонажа восстанавливаются до максимального значения. Чем выше уровень {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g} персонажа, тем больше у него ОД.
languages.original_text: Action points (AP) are used to perform attacks and use abilities in combat. Their amount is displayed on the abilities bar at the bottom of the screen. Each attack or ability has a certain AP cost. At the start of each turn, a character's AP is restored to its maximum value. The higher {g|Encyclopedia:Career}a character's doctrine{/g} level, the more AP they have.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Action points{/g} (AP) are used to perform attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat. Their amount is displayed on the abilities panel at the bottom of the screen. Each attack or ability has a certain AP cost. At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a character's AP is restored to its maximum value. The higher {g|Encyclopedia:Career}a character's archetype{/g} level, the more AP they have.
languages.original_text: Для совершения атак и применения способностей в бою используются очки действий (ОД). Их число отображается на панели в нижней части экрана. Каждая атака или способность требует определенных затрат ОД. В начале каждого хода ОД персонажа восстанавливаются до максимального значения. Чем выше уровень {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g} персонажа, тем больше у него ОД.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Action points{/g} (AP) are used to perform attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat. Their amount is displayed on the abilities panel at the bottom of the screen. Each attack or ability has a certain AP cost. At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a character's AP is restored to its maximum value. The higher {g|Encyclopedia:Career}a character's doctrine{/g} level, the more AP they have.

{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Action points{/g} (AP) are used to perform attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat. Their amount is displayed on the abilities panel at the bottom of the screen. Each attack or ability has a certain AP cost. At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a character's AP is restored to its maximum value. The higher {g|Encyclopedia:Career}a character's archetype{/g} level, the more AP they have.

languages.text: 在战斗中，{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}可以用来进行攻击，使用各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。行动点数会显示在屏幕下方的能力面板上。每种攻击与能力都会消耗一定量行动点数。每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，角色的行动点数会恢复至最大值。{g|Encyclopedia:Career}角色职业{/g}的等级越高，角色的行动点数就越多。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Action points{/g} (AP) are used to perform attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat. Their amount is displayed on the abilities panel at the bottom of the screen. Each attack or ability has a certain AP cost. At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a character's AP is restored to its maximum value. The higher {g|Encyclopedia:Career}a character's archetype{/g} level, the more AP they have.

traits.locale_text: 在战斗中，{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}可以用来进行攻击，使用各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。行动点数会显示在屏幕下方的能力面板上。每种攻击与能力都会消耗一定量行动点数。每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，角色的行动点数会恢复至最大值。{g|Encyclopedia:Career}角色信条{/g}的等级越高，角色的行动点数就越多。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}（AP）を使用して戦闘中攻撃したり、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用する。画面下のパネルにその数値が表示される。攻撃やアビリティそれぞれに、一定のAPコストがある。毎回の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時には、キャラクターのAPは最大値に回復している。{g|Encyclopedia:Career}キャラクターのタイプ{/g}レベルが高いほど、保有するAPが多い。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Action points{/g} (AP) are used to perform attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat. Their amount is displayed on the abilities panel at the bottom of the screen. Each attack or ability has a certain AP cost. At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a character's AP is restored to its maximum value. The higher {g|Encyclopedia:Career}a character's archetype{/g} level, the more AP they have.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}（AP）を使用すると、攻撃したり{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用したりできる。画面下のパネルに数値が表示される。攻撃やアビリティにはそれぞれ一定のAPコストがある。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、キャラクターのAPは最大値まで回復している。{g|Encyclopedia:Career}キャラクターのドクトリン{/g}レベルが高いほど、保有するAPが多い。

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} (PA) sirven para realizar ataques y usar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} en combate. El total se muestra en el panel de capacidades de la parte inferior de la pantalla. Cada ataque o capacidad tiene un coste en PA asociado. Los PA de cada jugador recuperan su valor máximo al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Cuanto mayor sea el nivel de{g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo de un personaje{/g}, más PA tendrá.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Action points{/g} (AP) are used to perform attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat. Their amount is displayed on the abilities panel at the bottom of the screen. Each attack or ability has a certain AP cost. At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a character's AP is restored to its maximum value. The higher {g|Encyclopedia:Career}a character's archetype{/g} level, the more AP they have.

traits.locale_text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} (PA) sirven para realizar ataques y usar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} en combate. El total se muestra en el panel de capacidades de la parte inferior de la pantalla. Cada ataque o capacidad tiene un coste en PA asociado. Los PA de cada jugador recuperan su valor máximo al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Cuanto mayor sea el nivel de{g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrina de un personaje{/g}, más PA tendrá.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} (AP) werden verwendet, um Angriffe auszuführen und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} im Kampf einzusetzen. Ihre Anzahl wird im Fähigkeitsfeld unten auf dem Bildschirm angezeigt. Jeder Angriff oder jede Fähigkeit kosten eine bestimmte Anzahl von AP. Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} werden die AP eines Charakters auf ihren Maximalwert zurückgesetzt. Je höher die Stufe {g|Encyclopedia:Career}des Archetyps eines Charakters{/g} ist, desto mehr AP hat er.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Action points{/g} (AP) are used to perform attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat. Their amount is displayed on the abilities panel at the bottom of the screen. Each attack or ability has a certain AP cost. At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a character's AP is restored to its maximum value. The higher {g|Encyclopedia:Career}a character's archetype{/g} level, the more AP they have.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} (AP) werden verwendet, um Angriffe auszuführen und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} im Kampf einzusetzen. Ihre Anzahl wird im Fähigkeitsfeld unten auf dem Bildschirm angezeigt. Jeder Angriff oder jede Fähigkeit kosten eine bestimmte Anzahl von AP. Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} werden die AP eines Charakters auf ihren Maximalwert zurückgesetzt. Je höher die {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Doktrin-Stufe{/g} eines Charakters ist, desto mehr AP hat er.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} (PA) permettent de lancer des attaques et d'utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} au combat. Leur nombre est affiché dans le panneau des capacités situé en bas de l'écran. Chaque attaque ou capacité présente un certain coût en termes de PA. Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, les PA d'un personnage sont restaurés à leur valeur maximale. Plus le niveau d’{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype d'un personnage{/g} est élevé, plus il dispose de PA.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Action points{/g} (AP) are used to perform attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat. Their amount is displayed on the abilities panel at the bottom of the screen. Each attack or ability has a certain AP cost. At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a character's AP is restored to its maximum value. The higher {g|Encyclopedia:Career}a character's archetype{/g} rank, the more AP they have.

traits.locale_text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} (PA) permettent de lancer des attaques et d'utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} au combat. Leur nombre est affiché dans le panneau des capacités situé en bas de l'écran. Chaque attaque ou capacité présente un certain coût en termes de PA. Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, les PA d'un personnage sont restaurés à leur valeur maximale. Plus le niveau de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrine d'un personnage{/g} est élevé, plus il dispose de PA.
